definition: erhua variant of 人緣|人缘[ren2 yuan2]

sentences.english: You are win popular with masses.
sentences.chinese: 你人缘好人气旺赢得众望。

sentences.english: There is no harvest to reap, letting opportunity pass us by.
sentences.chinese: 正如种田而没有播种，皆是空过人缘。

sentences.english: I hope he is very popular, and fairness.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他很有人缘，公平公正。

sentences.english: Giving up being liked is the ultimate public sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 最大的公共牺牲就是得放弃好人缘。

sentences.english: Popularity and rejection factors also exist in college students' psychology.
sentences.chinese: 大学生友爱心理有人缘因素和排斥因素。

sentences.english: Everyone likes him because of his good personality.
sentences.chinese: 因为他的个性好，所以他的人缘很好。

sentences.english: “We have strong men here, you know, ” she said.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，我们在这儿很有人缘。

sentences.english: Good self-esteem is necessary for good relationships。
He got in bad among his friends.
In the company as a leader, I think you are not only a good brain, popularity is also very good.
sentences.chinese: 在公司当领导，我想您不但头脑好，人缘也一定很好。

sentences.english: Thongh she is not good at study, she is popular in our class.
sentences.chinese: 虽然她学习不好，但她在班里人缘很好。

definition: erhua variant of 人緣|人缘[ren2 yuan2]
luck with the ladies/a romance/good luck
be smooth and slick (in establishing social relations)
undertaking/project/activity/(charitable, political or revolutionary) cause/publicly funded institution, enterprise or foundation/career/occupation/CL:個|个[ge4]
spacious and well-lit/open and clear/(of character) optimistic/cheerful/carefree
